title: The Alien Who Stole My Heart
description: A story of boy, to man; at the age of 20, Tom; an atheist struggling to find meaning in life, has a near death experience. In the midst of his change in spirituality, after what he experienced, Tom is thrown in the middle of a NSA conspiracy involving a beautiful young alien named Kristina. The two learn of a serious situation involving all of humanity, and embark on a journey that brings them closer. "The Alien Who Stole My Heart" has been described as; "wonderfully unique," "very intriguing," "refreshing and funny," "very engaging," "interesting," "very fascinating," "vivid," "very well written," "compelling," "very gripping," and "riveting."
author: N.C. Micol
